-e ---

𓊧

mend menenun tumnun tenun nähen Naht Neith (goddess of weaving II) 𓋌 𓋋 𓏏 𓁐

𓅓 𓂝 𓆭 | make fast, bind | ⲙⲟⲩⲣ 0. moore 1. mend 2. µbind
𓏠 𓏏 𓐪 | mooring post, whipping post | √mend 𓏠 𓈖 𓇋 𓏏 𓐪 𓆱 | mooring post, whipping post | √mend 𓏠 𓈖 𓇋 𓐪 𓊛 | moor (ship), marry (to), attach (to), endow (with) | mend! marnel = mooring ⋍ marrying
𓌻 𓂋 𓍢 𓂡 | bind | amarrar amarrer from Dutch aanmeren moor ⇔ मव्यति mavyati
𓌻 𓂋 𓍢 𓋳 | bind | atar aptar aptāre täuen
